main event: A civilian observed a round object glowing yellow in Bremerton, Washington on December 8, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a baseball,The observation lasted between 10 to 15 seconds,The object moved from 45 degrees in the east to 80 degrees in the west,The sighting occurred approximately 500 feet above the top of an 800-foot hill,The analysis suggested it was probably a balloon due to a weather balloon release prior to the sighting.
sighted object: a round object with a yellow glow
